sudo: unable to resolve host debian?
/etc/hosts

how to use sudo by user liujianwei?
su
chmod u+w /etc/sudoers
vi /etc/sudoers

# User privilege specification
root    ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL
liujianwei ALL=(ALL) ALL

# Allow members of group sudo to execute any command
sudo    ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL

esc
wq
chmod u-w /etc/sudoers
sudo usermod -aG sudo liujianwei

how can import music and photos from iphone to debian?
sudo apt-get install libimobiledevice-utils gvfs-backends gvfs-bin gvfs-fuse
sudo vi /etc/fuse.conf
user_allow_other
sudo groupadd fuse
sudo usermod -aG fuse liujianwei
when i connect iphone to debian,there is only camera option,click camera and i can see nothing.

how to change language from english to chinese?
it is impossbile for me to change language.
it is impossbile for me to see no english on debian.
it is possbile for me to see no chinese on debian.

liujianwei@debian:~$ env | grep LANG
LANG=en_US.utf8
GDM_LANG=en_US.utf8
liujianwei@debian:~$ export LANG=zh_cn.UTF-8
liujianwei@debian:~$ dpkg-reconfigure locales
bash: dpkg-reconfigure: command not found
liujianwei@debian:~$ export LANG=en-^CTF-8
liujianwei@debian:~$ env | grep LANG
LANG=zh_cn.UTF-8
GDM_LANG=en_US.utf8
liujianwei@debian:~$ export LANG=en-US.UTF-8
liujianwei@debian:~$ env | grep LANG
LANG=en-US.UTF-8
GDM_LANG=en_US.utf8
liujianwei@debian:~$
liujianwei@debian:~$ su
Password:
root@debian:/home/liujianwei# apt-get install dpkg-reconfigure
Reading package lists... Done
Building dependency tree       
Reading state information... Done
E: Unable to locate package dpkg-reconfigure
root@debian:/home/liujianwei#

Write files to a CD or DVD?
Place an empty disc into your CD/DVD writable drive.In the Blank CD/DVD-R Disc notification that pop up at the bottom of the screen, select Open with CD/DVD Creator. The CD/DVD Creator folder window will open.

how to install mame and kof97?
su
apt-get install mame chromium
vi /etc/mame/mame.ini
rm /usr/local/share/games/mame/roms/*
cp /home/liujianwei/Downloads/* /usr/local/share/games/mame/roms/
mame neogeo -verifyroms
mame kof97 -verifyroms

neogeo
kof97
kof98
http://www.retroroms.info/

deb http://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/debian-security jessie/updates main contrib non-free

how to let KDE understand and format usb flash drive file system?
Launch GParted on the disk.
If any partitions are mounted (as indicated by a lock or key icon), unmount them.
Select Device->Create Partition Table.
Click Apply.
Label jinsha
chown -R liujianwei:liujianwei /media/liujianwei/jinsha


Why Debian PPTP VPN need open MPPE option?
Debian does not default support PPTP VPN because PPTP VPN is not free,here is what I do 

su
apt-get install openvpn
apt-get install pptpd
apt-get install network-manager-openvpn-gnome
apt-get install network-manager-pptp-gnome
reboot

Identity
Advanced
PPTP Advanced Options
Use Point-to-Point encryption (MPPE)
there is no need install anything in kde because kde default support pptp

debian 8.6.0 freeze format ssd?
USB Oricon HDD chinese chip cause debian 8.6.0 freeze format ssd,unplug USB Oricon HDD and install Debian 8.6.0 successful

how to change grub language from chinese to english?
su
# export LANG=en_US.UTF-8
dpkg-reconfigure locales
update-grub
A window will ask you to select the languages (you select with SPACE) you want to have available. Choose your own.
Changes may not show immediately, a reboot will be needed.
